Uses of Class
circeIsland.main.DrawingSurface

Packages that use DrawingSurface 
Package Description
circeIsland.creatures  
circeIsland.elements

  • Uses of DrawingSurface in circeIsland.creatures

    Methods in circeIsland.creatures with parameters of type DrawingSurface 
    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void Circe.draw​(DrawingSurface g)
    The Circe will be drawn by Creature.java draw method, and Additionally, the circe inventory would be drawn If circe is not in the grid, it does not draw anything.
    void Creature.draw​(DrawingSurface g)
    It will draw the creature on the drawing surface.
    void MaliciousVisitor.draw​(DrawingSurface g)
    The MaliciousVisitor will be drawn by Creature.java draw method Additionally, it will update the the some private values inside the malicious visitor
    void Nymph.draw​(DrawingSurface g)
    The nymph will be drawn by Creature.java draw method It will try to set nymph's house if nymph does not have a house It will draw "huh?" or "huh!" on top of its head when it feels bad
    void MaliciousVisitor.stealMessage​(DrawingSurface g)
    It will draw the "Yay I Stole!" on top of the head

    Constructors in circeIsland.screens with parameters of type DrawingSurface 
    Constructor Description
    Information​(DrawingSurface surface)
    Creates a new information screen on the given PApplet
    Island​(DrawingSurface surface, processing.core.PImage islandImage, Circe c, int houseX, int houseY)
